name: Docsum
headline: AI contract repository
description: Docsum is a contract intelligence platform designed for legal and finance teams. Using AI, Docsum extracts critical data like renewal dates, obligations, and more into a searchable database. The platform is fully customizable with features like custom field reporting, alerts, and playbook-powered redlining. Getting started is simpleâ€”upload contracts or connect Docsum to tools like Google Drive, DocuSign, and more.
tags: industry:documents; industry:b2b; industry:legal; industry:legaltech; industry:ai; location:new-york

founders.name: Shaunak Turaga, Founder
founders.description: I'm serving as CEO and co-founder of Docsum (S23). I have a background as a developer, product manager, and founder at places like Pacaso, OpenTrack, Capital One, and IBM.

founders.name: Alex Leonov, Founder
founders.description: I'm serving as CTO and co-founder of Docsum (S23). I'm a people-focused engineer striving to get 1% better every day and empower others to do their best work. I believe that a strong value system lies at the heart of the most impactful organizations. I have a background as a developer, software architect, and founder at startups and enterprise organizations.

## Close 10x faster with the power of AI
Docsum helps legal and sales teams speed up contract review and redlining
[![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/LIWpJYh1CLpU6CzESyvWvd597mg.png)Contract RepositoryEffortlessly track key terms, dates, and obligations from all your contracts in a centalized repository. Pre-Signature
### Review + Negotiate
Use Docsum to review redlines on 1st party and 3rd party paper using our AI document editor and configurable playbooks. Keep your team in sync.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BZnzPImkkguKpjAOjhd9wS5L9s.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BZnzPImkkguKpjAOjhd9wS5L9s.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BZnzPImkkguKpjAOjhd9wS5L9s.svg)
Post-Signature
### Contract Database
Centralize all key contract data from signed agreements from Docusign, Google Drive, OneDrive, and more. Docsum AI extracts key dates, terms, and obligations.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/o5VtLWjVFSoWmruG0Tx2esIyLZQ.svg)

generated_description:
**Docsum: Your AI-Powered Contract Repository**

Founded in 2023 and based in New York, Docsum is an innovative entry into the world of legal technology, designed specifically for legal and finance teams. Backed by Y Combinator's Batch S23, this compact team of four is on a mission to transform how businesses manage their contracts.

### What Does Docsum Do?

Docsum is a contract intelligence platform that utilizes artificial intelligence to streamline the way organizations handle contracts. By extracting vital information such as renewal dates and obligations, it creates a centralized, searchable database. This means that instead of sifting through piles of paperwork or searching through countless files, users can quickly find the data they need.

### Key Features

- **Customizable Contract Management:** Upload contracts directly or integrate with tools like Google Drive and DocuSign to centralize your data.
- **AI Document Editor:** Collaborate with your team to review contracts through smart issue detection and version management.
- **Automated Contract Reviewing:** Use Docsumâ€™s AI-driven playbooks to enable customized contract reviews and redlining based on established precedents.
- **Centralized Database:** Effortlessly track key terms and obligations to eliminate the time wasted searching for critical contract data.

### Why Docsum?

In an environment where time is money, capturing the essence of contracts efficiently can lead to significant savings. Docsum claims that it can help legal and sales teams close deals 10 times faster, a bold promise that addresses a real pain point in contract negotiation and management.

For those interested in speeding up their contract workflows, Docsum offers live demos to showcase its powerful capabilities.

### Connect With Docsum

Explore more about what Docsum has to offer on their website: [docsum.ai](https://www.docsum.ai). If youâ€™re looking to streamline your contract processes, why not book a demo and give it a try?

In the realm of legal tech, innovation like Docsum isn't just beneficial; it's becoming essential. As contracts become more complex, platforms like this offer a solution that blends efficiency with practicality, making life easier for teams everywhere.
